for(let i=array.length-1;i>0;i--){const j=Math.floor(Math.random()*(i+1));[array[i],array[j]]=[array[j],array[i]];}return array;};const App=()=>{const[highlightFile1,setHighlightFile1]=useState(false);const[highlightFile2,setHighlightFile2]=useState(false);const[shuffledFile1,setShuffledFile1]=useState([]);const[shuffledFile2,setShuffledFile2]=useState([]);const[selectedPNR,setSelectedPNR]=useState(null);const[selectedCabin,setSelectedCabin]=useState(null);const[selectedClass,setSelectedClass]=useState(null);const[selectedInfo,setSelectedInfo]=useState(null);const[selectedCancelledInfo,setSelectedCancelledInfo]=useState(null);const move=()=>{document.getElementById('mover').style.display="flex";setTimeout(()=>{document.getElementById('mover').style.transform="translate(1150px)";},50);try{setTimeout(()=>{document.getElementById('mover').style.display="none";setTimeout(()=>{document.getElementById('mover').style.transform="translate(270px)";},50);},3000);}catch{}};useEffect(()=>{setShuffledFile1(shuffleArray([...file1]));setShuffledFile2(shuffleArray([...file2]));},[highlightFile1,highlightFile2]);const handleButtonClick=()=>{setHighlightFile1(!highlightFile1);setHighlightFile2(!highlightFile2);};const handleCardClick=entry=>{try{// Only handle click for red cards

".concat(inventoryId,"
").concat(departureCity,"
").concat(arrivalCity));}// Extracting information from the Cancelled Flights attribute

".concat(cancelledInventoryId,"
").concat(cancelledDepartureCity,"
").concat(cancelledArrivalCity));}}move();}catch{}};const getFile1Class=()=>highlightFile1?'red clickable':'';const getFile2Class=()=>highlightFile2?'green':'';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"PNR Numbers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-container",children:[shuffledFile1.map((entry,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card ".concat(getFile1Class()),onClick:()=>handleCardClick(entry),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:entry.PNR_Number})},index)),shuffledFile2.map((entry,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card ".concat(getFile2Class())// Note: handleCardClick not applied to green cards
,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:entry.PNR_Number})},index))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleButtonClick,children:"Show affected PNRs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"textbox-container1",children:highlightFile1&&selectedPNR&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"textbox smaller",id:"mover",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:selectedPNR,readOnly:true})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"textbox-container",children:[highlightFile1&&selectedCancelledInfo&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"textbox rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:plane,className:"plane",id:"leftplane"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:selectedCancelledInfo,readOnly:true})]}),highlightFile1&&selectedInfo&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"textbox rounded",id:"right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:plane,id:"rightplane"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:selectedInfo,readOnly:true})]})]})]});};export default App;
